settings.text: Quickly and easily exchange Shirts, Sweatshirts or Slippers for another size with our Returns Portal.

You have 90 days from the day of purchase to start an exchange.

Exchanges available only for US 48 customers.

settings.title: PaaPii & LahtiSet Size Exchanges (FREE)
settings.text:
Lahtiset Slippers and PaaPii clothing purchased online can be exchanged for another size for FREE by using our online return portal.

Please note: Exchanges are only available for items from the original order and not to exchanged items.

settings.title: Shirt / Sweatshirt Exchange ($4.95)
settings.text:
Shirts / Sweatshirts purchased online can be exchanged for another size for $4.95 by using our online return portal.

Please note: Exchanges only available for items from the original order and not to exchanged items.

settings.title: Other Items
settings.text:
We only offer exchanges for Shirts, Sweatshirts and Lahtiset Slippers.

Otherwise, we do not offer exchanges but we welcome you to return the item(s) by mail in accordance with our Return Policy by using our online returns portal and repurchasing any available item(s) on our site.

settings.title: Can I purchase a return shipping label?
settings.text:
Yes! Touch of Finland offers return shipping labels for US 48 customers. Using our prepaid return shipping labels is the recommended way to return your purchase, as you will be able to track your return and receive your refund much more quickly than if you were to send your return back yourself.

Prepaid return shipping labels can be purchased for $9.95 per order. Return shipping labels can be purchased and all returns can be submitted in our Returns Portal.

Some items aren’t eligible for return via prepaid return labels but you may elect to return the item back yourself. Ineligible items: Sauna Buckets, Steamers/Juicers

settings.title: Can I exchange items?
settings.text:
We offer size exchanges for T-Shirts and Lahtiset Slippers. You can find details about size exchanges here.

Otherwise, we do not offer exchanges but we welcome you to return the item(s) by mail in accordance with our Return Policy by using our online returns portal and repurchasing any available item(s) on our site.

settings.title: Should I know anything else about the Online Return Policy?
settings.text:
All returned items must be in new and unused condition, with all original tags and packaging.

We are not liable for any returned items that may become damaged in-transit. Please pack breakable items securely.

Include a note inside the return package with the order number and name.

We will refund your original payment method within 1-5 business days after we receive and accept your return.

settings.title: Gift Returns
settings.text:
To start a return for gift orders, you must have the order number and shipping zip code.

Contact for assistance

Start Return >

If you have received a damaged/defective item or an item that is not the one you ordered, please contact customer service within 5 days of delivery by submitting photos of proof to orders@touchoffinland.com. We will offer a refund or replacement item.
